Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Silicon Board^reset; to the scientist at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 提醒：你会需要大量的硅板的，因为制造更先进的芯片的过程中都需要他们。
Texts.Eng: Encouraging: You will need a large amount of boards, for they are the building block of many more advanced chipsets.
Instructive: Now that you have ^orange;Silicon^reset; and ^orange;Copper Wire^reset; why not combine the two at your ^orange;Matter Assembler^reset; and craft a ^orange;Silicon Board^reset;?
